title: T206 HOFers for sale - PRICES REDUCED
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: T206 HOFers for sale - PRICES REDUCED
posts.post_content:
Selling some T206 HOFers - graded and ungraded - see scans for details. Open to offers on the group. PM me or email [url]crb_972@yahoo.com[/url] for questions or to confirm. 

(backs are scans of the raw cards - L/R: Willis, McGinnity, Davis, Chance)

Willis - solid G/VG - clean Piedmont 350 back - sold
McGinnity - F - crease on front bottom and light back damage - $50
Davis - G/VG - clean front, light staining on back - sold
Chance - G/VG - clean front and light back pull - SOLD
Griffith - PSA 3 - clean SC 150 with a Factory 649 overprint back - $130 (mark near face is on holder, not card)
Walsh - PSA 3 - nice front, clean SC back - SOLD
Jennings - PSA 2 - light wear to front, clean back - $75
Beckley - F/G - light staining on SC back - sold
